name: Invade (ShineZ)
description:
Reminder:
If You're Scared of Blood, JumpScare You Should not play this game.

Story:
 The man was working then heard an explosion. He walked out of the room to find his coworker but there was no time to talk and his coworker got killed by some alien right in front of his eye. What was left was a gun his coworker had dropped and he will need to stop these creatures from entering Earth.

Extras:
- We Made this game in 3 Days
- This game is still in development
  [currently in demo]
- If you like or dislike please give us feedback
  so we can improve the game :3

our Members:
- StangShineZ
 : Game Designer, Art, Animator, Story, Coder, Effect
- SunSun
 : Art, Map Designer, Sound, Plot Director

Credits:
- Main Menu Sound by P'Pak (Kano Soundtrack)
